bibl.title: Pozdnerimskij kolonat-mif, sozdann'y istorikami? (Po povodu statei J.-M. Carrié). Avec résumé en anglais: Late Roman Colonat: A Myth Created by Historians? (Some Notes on Articles by J.-M. Carrié).
